body:
If something goes wrong with your interview, we encourage you to find a solution for your problem in our Support Page which has a number of articles to help you out in any kind of situation. If you are still facing the problem then you can reach out to us via email or phone:

  • Email: support@hackerrank.com  
  • Phone: 1-415-900-4023

When speaking with support, please be sure to have the test link to the interview ready for the agent.
title: There is an Issue with My Interview. What Should I Do?
